headline: How Investors May Respond To eBay (EBAY) Linking Net-Zero Roadmap With Circular Fashion Expansion
summary: In early 2026, eBay released its first Climate Transition Plan, detailing a pathway to reach net-zero greenhouse gas emissions across its supply chain by 2045, alongside expanding its Circular Fashion Fund to more regions to support circular fashion and lower textile waste. By embedding climate targets into financial planning and governance while backing external innovators through the Circular Fashion Fund, eBay is tying its marketplace model more closely to sustainability-focused...
